sample_docs: Home | Media | Careers | Investors | Locations | Contact Us About Us | Products & Solutions | Technology People spend more time in their vehicles than ever before. Johnson Controls' Automotive Experience has a unique insight into how People spend more time in their vehicles than ever before. Johnson Controls' Automotive Experience has a unique insight into how consumers interact with vehicle interiors. This is why we can provide the automakers with the right combination of style, comfort and convenience for their vehicle interiors. It is not only about manufacturing - we design, engineer, integrate and deliver them globally. Innovative automotive interiors help make driving more comfortable, safe and enjoyable. Our automotive product portfolio includes seating systems, instrument panels, door panels, overhead systems, floor consoles and interior electronics. Groundbreaking research from Johnson Controls called human-machine-interaction (HMI) drives automotive... Read more As today's vehicles have become more and more sophisticated, the demand for electricity to power their myriad electronics has As today's vehicles have become more and more sophisticated, the demand for electricity to power their myriad electronics has grown exponentially. Johnson Controls has used ingenuity and innovation to become the world's largest producer of lead-acid automotive batteries and continues to break new ground by developing advanced battery chemistries for hybrids. For us, something that just works isn't good enough if it can work better. Johnson Controls is a global leader in the production of batteries for hybrid electric vehicles. It's a global effort ... Read more When energy efficiency in a home or building increases, it's not only the utility bill that goes down. So do the greenhouse gas When energy efficiency in a home or building increases, it's not only the utility bill that goes down. So do the greenhouse gas emissions associated with the burning of fossil fuels. The smart environments we create for customers are efficient, safe and sustainable. That makes the occupants more productive and more comfortable. And that's good for business ... and for life. Johnson Controls' Battery Testing Center is expanding to fit the entire hybrid battery team under one roof, which ... Read more Site map | Privacy | of use | Copyright

English United States - English 利用數據 我們會根據所有安全資產創建一份清單, 並對其進行"映射", 從而以虛擬形式呈現您的設施、系统和資產之後。我們合自動並持續地對您的數據進行遠程監控,並使用我們全面的工具集對這些數據進行分析,以在極短的時間內發現問題而通常情況下,這些同題可能多數後才,會顯現或可以檢測出來。我們可帶助您最大限度地利用您的安全資產。 保障服務 保障服務涵蓋一系列功能,可以為安全團隊提供事件影像信息和自動化處置能力,同時還可以提供您所需的多種工具,幫助您在整個生命周期內對資產進行管理,從而確保此類資產的使用合法合規。 資產標準與流程:對整個企業的數據模式進行標準化,以提高一致性 數據完整性:自動梳理常見故障/便從而至於識別和解決這類故障 監控:使用您首選的客戶關系管理(CRM)系統自動創建工作服務單 資產生命周期:在資產的整個生命周期內抓取相關指標, 以分析總體擁有成本(TCO)、製造商表現、集成商服務表現、服務等级協議(SLA)和保修追蹤 安全資產監控 物聯網設備在樓宇系统中的普遍應用帯來了日益嚴重的安全威脅。江森自控保障服務通過對安全資產進行築中管理和遠程監控 來 幫助解決這一問題。這使您能夠迅速發現並解決問題。 尋找讓設施變得更智能、更安全的機會。 白皮书 Is Your Security Network Ready for GDPR? 视频 How Data Analytics Drive Future Innovation for Security 白皮书 Is Your Security Network Ready for GDPR? 视频 How Data Analytics Drive Future Innovation for Security 聯繫我們 查找位置 樓宇自控系統 暖通空調系統 安防產品 火警檢測 消防滅火產品 工業冷凍 數位化解決方案 零售解决方案 智慧建築 樓宇自控系統 暖通空調系統 安防產品 火警檢測 消防滅火產品 工業冷凍 數位化解決方案 零售解决方案 零組件服務 日常服務及保養 專家檢測與效能檢查 節能改造與系統優化 綠色建築節能認證服務 資料下載 服務 零組件服務 日常服務及保養 專家檢測與效能檢查 節能改造與系統優化 綠色建築節能認證服務 資料下載 我們的公司 職業發展 投資者 (U.S. Site) 供應商 (U.S. Site) 網路解決方案 (U.S. Site) 銷售夥伴 (U.S. Site) 可持續性 (U.S. Site) 地點 聯繫我們 關於我們 我們的公司 職業發展 投資者 (U.S. Site) 供應商 (U.S. Site) 網路解決方案 (U.S. Site) 銷售夥伴 (U.S. Site) 可持續性 (U.S. Site) 地點 聯繫我們 江森自控保留所有權利。 法律 隱私設置

Čeština United Kingdom - English Saudi Arabia - English United States - English We Help You Protect People and Assets in Every Conceivable Setting A key part of your mission is to build and operate facilities that are safe and secure, whether your space is designed for people, for products, or for both. Addressing this challenge is at the very core of what we do at Johnson Controls. We offer the broadest array of products, connected and controlled by the most advanced systems and technologies, combined and configured to deliver a solution that's right for your facility and right for your bottom line. Working with our customers and partners around the world, we are creating a smart future for all kinds of facilities. We make buildings better for occupants, better for the environment, and better for your bottom line. Johnson Controls: The power behind your mission . Real Facilities; Real Solutions Read about how our customers are using Johnson Controls solutions to change the way their buildings and facilities work.
